DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety JTT-705 demonstrate efficacy JTT-705 compare placebo co-administered simvastatin 40 mg patient low HDL
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study JTT-705 Combination With Simvastatin 40 mg Patients With Low High-Density Lipoprotein ( HDL ) Levels
DOC.criteria: Patients lipid value indicate : HDLC ≤ 1.0 mmol/L ( 40 mg/dL ) TG ≤4.5 mmol/L ( 400 mg/dL ) Patients CHD CHD risk equivalent Male females 18 70 year age ( female patient must postmenopausal , surgically sterile use acceptable form contraception ) Body Mass Index ≥ 35 kg/m2 Females pregnant breastfeeding , females child bear potential use effective method contraception Concomitant use medication identify protocol
